column3: 英文解釋 (English Explanation)
column5: 中文解釋與備註 (Chinese Explanation & Note)

column3: The amount listed in the loan application.
column5: 借款人最初申請的貸款總金額。

column3: The number of scheduled payments on the loan.
column5: 貸款的還款期數（例如：36 個月或 60 個月）。

column3: Interest Rate on the loan.
column5: 貸款的年利率（Annual Percentage Rate, APR）。

column3: The monthly payment owed by the borrower.
column5: 借款人每月必須償還的金額。

column3: The loan grade assigned by the bank (A, B, C, etc.).
column5: 信用機構分配的貸款總體風險等級。

column3: The sub-grade of the loan grade (A1, A2, B1, etc.).
column5: 貸款等級的進一步細分。

column3: The job title supplied by the borrower.
column5: 借款人的工作職位。

column3: Employment length in years.
column5: 借款人目前的工作年資。

column3: The home ownership status of the borrower.
column5: 借款人的房屋狀態（如 RENT/租賃, MORTGAGE/抵押）。

column3: The annual income supplied by the borrower.
column5: 借款人提供的每年總收入。

column3: Indicates if income was verified by the bank.
column5: 收入是否已經過銀行驗證。

column3: The month in which the loan was funded.
column5: 貸款發放的月份。

column3: Current status of the loan (e.g., Fully Paid or Charged Off).
column5: 目標標籤：貸款目前是否已付清或已違約。

column3: A category provided by the borrower for the loan purpose.
column5: 借款人申請貸款的主要用途類別。

column3: A ratio calculated using the borrower's total monthly debt payments.
column5: 每月債務支付佔每月總收入的百分比。

column3: The date the borrower's earliest credit line was opened.
column5: 借款人最早開立信用額度的日期。

column3: The number of open credit accounts in the borrower's file.
column5: 借款人目前持有的活躍信用帳戶數量。

column3: Number of derogatory public records (e.g., bankruptcies).
column5: 不良公共紀錄的數量（例如：破產）。

column3: Total credit revolving balance.
column5: 借款人信用卡上未償還的總餘額。

column3: Revolving line utilization rate.
column5: 已使用信用額度佔總額度的百分比。

column3: Total account
column4: 累積曾經開過的信用帳戶總數
column5: 包含已關閉與開放中帳戶, 用來看信用歷史深度

column4: 放款平台, w (whole loan 全部), f (fractional 部份/切割)

column3: Application Type
column4: 申請類型, INDIVIDUAL(個人申請), JOINT(聯合申請, 例如夫妻)

column3: Mortage Account
Public Record Bankruptcies
The address provided by the borrower.
column5: 借款人提供的地址資訊。
